page.title: 15Videos in Streetly
page.content:
There are{14 people}who have got { {videos in our class of 30.}A video recorder records programmes that you have missed so you can watch it if some one has recorded it. There is a timer to set so that the program will be recorded when you are not at home. The video picks up sound and pictures on a magnetic tape instead of film. If a video camera is connected to a video recorder it is possible to record movement and sound like a cine-film camera. Video tapes can be played back through a television instead of a projector and screen. It is possible to buy or hire a video tape for use at home. The nearest place is Boundary Court where you can hire a film for Â£l.00 a night.
by Steven Mattey and Julian Caine (aged 8)
